building_short_description_texts.short_description: %placeholder%

short_description.last_approved_text: A mound of black soil and knotted roots, upon which fell spells may be cast, rises from the ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mound of black soil and knotted roots, upon which fell spells may be cast, rises from the ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: Darkling councils are gatherings of Bray-Shamans. Such a concentration of arcane bodies is bound to lure forth a Cygor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Darkling councils are gatherings of Bray-Shamans. Such a concentration of arcane bodies is bound to lure forth a Cygor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Centigors can be found in the grassy plains bordering the deeper forests, where they try to outrun the elements.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Centigors can be found in the grassy plains bordering the deeper forests, where they try to outrun the elements.

short_description.last_approved_text: Centigors are incapable of building their own shelters and so find hollows in which to rest and revel.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Centigors are incapable of building their own shelters and so find hollows in which to rest and revel.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strongest Centigors make their lairs in crude shelters or caves, daring any to challenge them for the superior residence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strongest Centigors make their lairs in crude shelters or caves, daring any to challenge them for the superior residence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warhounds that accompany the Beastmen are kept in crude dens, where they are fed prey - both living and dead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warhounds that accompany the Beastmen are kept in crude dens, where they are fed prey - both living and dead.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are places in the blood-grounds were suppurating wounds burst from the ground and poison fumes belch from crags.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are places in the blood-grounds were suppurating wounds burst from the ground and poison fumes belch from crags.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the deep pits are kept Chaos Spawn, blessed with a multitude of gifts from their Dark Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In the deep pits are kept Chaos Spawn, blessed with a multitude of gifts from their Dark Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some Giants will meander into the forests and make a large cave their home if it's not already inhabited.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some Giants will meander into the forests and make a large cave their home if it's not already inhabited.

short_description.last_approved_text: A rudimentary shelter furthest from the camp's pyre, little more than an indent in the bony ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A rudimentary shelter furthest from the camp's pyre, little more than an indent in the bony ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: A pit hovel is a deeper rut, which, amidst the detritus, is where some Ungors choose to reside.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A pit hovel is a deeper rut, which, amidst the detritus, is where some Ungors choose to reside.

short_description.last_approved_text: Burrows inhabited by Gors often have stinking and gore-infested hides around their entrances.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Burrows inhabited by Gors often have stinking and gore-infested hides around their entrances.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pelts are placed on a grim totem, then taken into war by the herd's most fearsome warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pelts are placed on a grim totem, then taken into war by the herd's most fearsome warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen roam far in territory known as the blood-grounds. Anything that wanders there is prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Beastmen roam far in territory known as the blood-grounds. Anything that wanders there is prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hag trees, which carry countless vile fetishes in their jagged branches, are natural meeting places for warherds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The hag trees, which carry countless vile fetishes in their jagged branches, are natural meeting places for warherds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Little more than a great pyre surrounded by gore-soaked tents, rude burrows and makeshift pens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Little more than a great pyre surrounded by gore-soaked tents, rude burrows and makeshift pens.

short_description.last_approved_text: While not a permanent structure by any means, caves or burrows riddled with hag tree roots can house a brayherd.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While not a permanent structure by any means, caves or burrows riddled with hag tree roots can house a brayherd.

short_description.last_approved_text: Within the deepest cavern systems, the most ancient of tangled beast-paths forests of herdstones and pyres.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Within the deepest cavern systems, the most ancient of tangled beast-paths forests of herdstones and pyres.

short_description.last_approved_text: Minotaurs crave man-flesh the most. At the fire pits, manling meat sizzles on crude spits, drawing the tribes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Minotaurs crave man-flesh the most. At the fire pits, manling meat sizzles on crude spits, drawing the tribes.

short_description.last_approved_text: When prey is not plentiful, the meat larder is used, assuming its putrefying contents have not already rotted away…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When prey is not plentiful, the meat larder is used, assuming its putrefying contents have not already rotted away…

short_description.last_approved_text: To let the raging pyre lessen or extinguish is to proffer insults to the Dark Gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To let the raging pyre lessen or extinguish is to proffer insults to the Dark Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tribe's Razorgors are kept in rough, makeshift sties that cannot hold them should they show their teeth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The tribe's Razorgors are kept in rough, makeshift sties that cannot hold them should they show their teeth.

short_description.last_approved_text: Early following the establishment of a camp, Ungors are sent scurrying away to find wood for fires and other uses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Early following the establishment of a camp, Ungors are sent scurrying away to find wood for fires and other uses.

short_description.last_approved_text: More than mere dedications to the Plague Lord, piles of putrid, rotten flesh are points from whence Chaos flows.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More than mere dedications to the Plague Lord, piles of putrid, rotten flesh are points from whence Chaos flows.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World contains many altars to its myriad gods. When the Beastmen come, these sacred places will be despoiled.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World contains many altars to its myriad gods. When the Beastmen come, these sacred places will be despoiled.

short_description.last_approved_text: Valuable metal blades - taken during raids - are placed in a mound or stood against the herdstone itself.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Valuable metal blades - taken during raids - are placed in a mound or stood against the herdstone itself.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once given weapon and armour, Gors go to the horned totem to be blessed by the Granter of Savage Hate.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once given weapon and armour, Gors go to the horned totem to be blessed by the Granter of Savage Hate.

short_description.last_approved_text: Inside the Trickster's grove, his acolytes learn the many ways of mischief.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Inside the Trickster's grove, his acolytes learn the many ways of mischief.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where the followers of Loec guard his secrets from outsiders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where the followers of Loec guard his secrets from outsiders.

short_description.last_approved_text: A hunter is nothing without his weapons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A hunter is nothing without his weapons.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lightweight weapons of the Asrai are a mystery to other races.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lightweight weapons of the Asrai are a mystery to other races.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Elves of Athel Loren and their steeds are of one heart and mind.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Elves of Athel Loren and their steeds are of one heart and mind.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where Elven steeds graze, prior to the Hunt.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where Elven steeds graze, prior to the Hunt.

short_description.last_approved_text: True horsemanship requires a bond few but the Asrai understand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: True horsemanship requires a bond few but the Asrai understand.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep within the Chasm Glades, shielded from unwanted attention, the Forest Dragons lie sleeping.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep within the Chasm Glades, shielded from unwanted attention, the Forest Dragons lie sleeping.

short_description.last_approved_text: All Elves are required to learn the bowyer's craft.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All Elves are required to learn the bowyer's craft.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only the most skilful archer can craft in flint.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only the most skilful archer can craft in flint.

short_description.last_approved_text: To soar on the wings of eagles is a dream held by many but a reality few may experience.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To soar on the wings of eagles is a dream held by many but a reality few may experience.

short_description.last_approved_text: The windswept crags above Athel Loren are home to the Great Eagles.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The windswept crags above Athel Loren are home to the Great Eagles.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is said that the trees of Athel Loren have eyes… and ears.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is said that the trees of Athel Loren have eyes… and ears.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Deepwood is ever vigilant.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Deepwood is ever vigilant.

short_description.last_approved_text: The protection of Athel Loren is paramount to all Asrai.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The protection of Athel Loren is paramount to all Asrai.

short_description.last_approved_text: A true hunter needs only his bow and his wits to survive.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A true hunter needs only his bow and his wits to survive.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is forbidden to kill an animal for sport.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is forbidden to kill an animal for sport.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kurnous blesses those who hunt as he intended.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kurnous blesses those who hunt as he intended.

short_description.last_approved_text: The vine bears three kinds of grapes: the first of pleasure, the second of intoxication, the third of disgust.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The vine bears three kinds of grapes: the first of pleasure, the second of intoxication, the third of disgust.

short_description.last_approved_text: A feast is nothing without wine.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A feast is nothing without wine.

short_description.last_approved_text: The business of feasting requires much preparation and a really good vintage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The business of feasting requires much preparation and a really good vintage.

short_description.last_approved_text: A little intoxication is good for the soul.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A little intoxication is good for the soul.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is no such thing as an over-stocked cellar.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There is no such thing as an over-stocked cellar.

short_description.last_approved_text: As Winter grips the Deepwood the Eternal Guard begin their vigil.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As Winter grips the Deepwood the Eternal Guard begin their vigil.

short_description.last_approved_text: The kindred of Loec are not like their fellow Elves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The kindred of Loec are not like their fellow Elves.

short_description.last_approved_text: To guard the wild places of Athel Loren requires certain sacrifices.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To guard the wild places of Athel Loren requires certain sacrifices.

short_description.last_approved_text: In Winter, the Oak lies dormant; Orion reduced to ashes, Ariel safe within its dark embrace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In Winter, the Oak lies dormant; Orion reduced to ashes, Ariel safe within its dark embrace.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Oak's fate dictates not only the forest's wellbeing, but that of the Elven race also.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Oak's fate dictates not only the forest's wellbeing, but that of the Elven race also.

short_description.last_approved_text: With Spring, Orion emerges from the Oak once more, renewed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: With Spring, Orion emerges from the Oak once more, renewed.

short_description.last_approved_text: New branches stretch to break through the forest's canopy and touch the sky.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: New branches stretch to break through the forest's canopy and touch the sky.

short_description.last_approved_text: As the Oak flourishes, its boughs and leaves cover Athel Loren and bring protection to its occupants.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As the Oak flourishes, its boughs and leaves cover Athel Loren and bring protection to its occupants.

short_description.last_approved_text: True craftsmanship is a gift from the gods.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: True craftsmanship is a gift from the gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: Athel Loren's borderlands preserve the forest by protecting outsiders from the dark spirits within.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Athel Loren's borderlands preserve the forest by protecting outsiders from the dark spirits within.

short_description.last_approved_text: The intricate dance-rituals performed here tell the story of Athel Loren better than mere books ever could.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The intricate dance-rituals performed here tell the story of Athel Loren better than mere books ever could.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are some who do not wish to live in harmony, whose malice must therefore be contained.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are some who do not wish to live in harmony, whose malice must therefore be contained.

short_description.last_approved_text: A leafy vantage point, from which the Elves control their new territory.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A leafy vantage point, from which the Elves control their new territory.

short_description.last_approved_text: “We have thousands of such caches, and only a few of us know them all.”

building_short_description_texts.short_description: “We have thousands of such caches, and only a few of us know them all.”

short_description.last_approved_text: The worse the passage, the more welcome the port.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The worse the passage, the more welcome the port.

short_description.last_approved_text: From here, Elven outposts are connected to Athel Loren via the Worldroots.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From here, Elven outposts are connected to Athel Loren via the Worldroots.

short_description.last_approved_text: The towering obelisk channels the Winds of Magic where they can do no harm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The towering obelisk channels the Winds of Magic where they can do no harm.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those unfortunates caught within the forest when the Wild Hunt is running find a nobler purpose through sacrifice.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those unfortunates caught within the forest when the Wild Hunt is running find a nobler purpose through sacrifice.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Wood Elves are nourishing the Worldroots in this region, which also provides Amber for their coffers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Wood Elves are nourishing the Worldroots in this region, which also provides Amber for their coffers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The towering obelisk channels the Winds of Magic where they can do no harm.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Elves of Athel Loren understand wood in ways lesser races do not.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Elves of Athel Loren understand wood in ways lesser races do not.

short_description.last_approved_text: Devotion to one's art requires solitude.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Devotion to one's art requires solitude.

short_description.last_approved_text: Inspiration can be found in the eyes of another.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Inspiration can be found in the eyes of another.

short_description.last_approved_text: Do not lightly rouse the Forest Lords, for when they finally decide to unleash their wrath, all the wood rages with them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Do not lightly rouse the Forest Lords, for when they finally decide to unleash their wrath, all the wood rages with them.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Nothing enters the Deepwood without our seeing it."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Nothing enters the Deepwood without our seeing it."

short_description.last_approved_text: From such vantage points the paths and glades may easily be watched for trespassers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From such vantage points the paths and glades may easily be watched for trespassers.

short_description.last_approved_text: From tiny acorns, great oaks may grow.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From tiny acorns, great oaks may grow.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are few places in Athel Loren that are punctured by the light of the sun.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are few places in Athel Loren that are punctured by the light of the sun.

short_description.last_approved_text: Deep beneath the earth and protected from the elements, safe from harm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Deep beneath the earth and protected from the elements, safe from harm.

short_description.last_approved_text: The halls of the Asrai spring from the forest itself.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The halls of the Asrai spring from the forest itself.

short_description.last_approved_text: The glory of Elven halls is unmatched.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The glory of Elven halls is unmatched.

short_description.last_approved_text: Roots are the source of all life.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Roots are the source of all life.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Winds of Ghur blow fiercely through the Deepwood.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Winds of Ghur blow fiercely through the Deepwood.

short_description.last_approved_text: High above the darkened groves of Athel Loren rests the Canopy of Hysh.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: High above the darkened groves of Athel Loren rests the Canopy of Hysh.

short_description.last_approved_text: The goddess of the savage hunt exists for the thrill of the chase, no matter the prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The goddess of the savage hunt exists for the thrill of the chase, no matter the prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only ill-adjusted minds worship the Underworld's vengeful 'Pale Queen'.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only ill-adjusted minds worship the Underworld's vengeful 'Pale Queen'.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Mother watches over all her children.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Mother watches over all her children.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kurnous guides the aim of those true of heart.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kurnous guides the aim of those true of heart.

short_description.last_approved_text: Under the perennially auburn leaves of this mighty guardian, the forest grows and grows eternally.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Under the perennially auburn leaves of this mighty guardian, the forest grows and grows eternally.

short_description.last_approved_text: The arched growth of Druthandor is a leafed gateway to knowledge and understanding.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The arched growth of Druthandor is a leafed gateway to knowledge and understanding.

short_description.last_approved_text: These places are home to the vicious and embittered Dryads.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: These places are home to the vicious and embittered Dryads.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those that honour Loec are granted his many gifts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Those that honour Loec are granted his many gifts.

short_description.last_approved_text: The power of the Deepwood given form, the Treemen are loved and feared by all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The power of the Deepwood given form, the Treemen are loved and feared by all.

short_description.last_approved_text: The wending limbs and hollowed nooks infer the subversive and twisting nature within.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The wending limbs and hollowed nooks infer the subversive and twisting nature within.

short_description.last_approved_text: The branches and boughs of Threllock sway as Athel Loren sways, and forever will.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The branches and boughs of Threllock sway as Athel Loren sways, and forever will.

short_description.last_approved_text: The forest protects those who come to its defence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The forest protects those who come to its defence.

short_description.last_approved_text: The gnarled and barbed rockbriar can be moulded in to excellent defences.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The gnarled and barbed rockbriar can be moulded in to excellent defences.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strength of the Skycrown Oak is legendary.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strength of the Skycrown Oak is legendary.

short_description.last_approved_text: With Karak Eight Peaks once again in honest Dwarf hands, making it unassailable is now a matter of the greatest import.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: With Karak Eight Peaks once again in honest Dwarf hands, making it unassailable is now a matter of the greatest import.

short_description.last_approved_text: The effort expended to create the great Underhalls is matched only by the blood spilled when taking them back.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The effort expended to create the great Underhalls is matched only by the blood spilled when taking them back.

short_description.last_approved_text: The long-hidden resting places of legendary Dwarfs contain ages-old weapons of great power.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The long-hidden resting places of legendary Dwarfs contain ages-old weapons of great power.

short_description.last_approved_text: Often found high in the mountains, these checkpoints are mainly used by Dwarf Ranger scouting parties.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Often found high in the mountains, these checkpoints are mainly used by Dwarf Ranger scouting parties.

short_description.last_approved_text: Although well hidden from lazy, non-Dawi eyes, Rangers barrack in strategic locations, ever-ready to spring into action.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Although well hidden from lazy, non-Dawi eyes, Rangers barrack in strategic locations, ever-ready to spring into action.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Greenskins used the dark, hidden passageways to conquer Karak Eight Peaks, and through them they continue to maintain their vile threat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Greenskins used the dark, hidden passageways to conquer Karak Eight Peaks, and through them they continue to maintain their vile threat.

short_description.last_approved_text: Having fought many great battles to take Karak Eight Peaks, the shiny loot acquired is the icing on the Greenskins’ disgusting, mucus-encrusted cake.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Having fought many great battles to take Karak Eight Peaks, the shiny loot acquired is the icing on the Greenskins’ disgusting, mucus-encrusted cake.

short_description.last_approved_text: Humiliation and dishonour are the Dwarfs’ rewards, as the tombs of their Ancestors lie ruined and defiled.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Humiliation and dishonour are the Dwarfs’ rewards, as the tombs of their Ancestors lie ruined and defiled.

short_description.last_approved_text: Getting the foul-tempered, lethal Squigs into their cages is one thing, keeping your fingers whilst feeding them is quite another.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Getting the foul-tempered, lethal Squigs into their cages is one thing, keeping your fingers whilst feeding them is quite another.

short_description.last_approved_text: Chaos is the despoiler and in its minions' wake comes corruption, ensuring that ruins forever have a foul taint!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Chaos is the despoiler and in its minions' wake comes corruption, ensuring that ruins forever have a foul taint!

short_description.last_approved_text: When the Undead destroy, the defender’s spirits are left to haunt such ruins - a callous reminder of their failure.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the Undead destroy, the defender’s spirits are left to haunt such ruins - a callous reminder of their failure.

short_description.last_approved_text: On the village green, peasants are given sword, spear and a veteran warder to train them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On the village green, peasants are given sword, spear and a veteran warder to train them.

short_description.last_approved_text: For larger musters, a more populated area closer to the town is required.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For larger musters, a more populated area closer to the town is required.

short_description.last_approved_text: The local watch is garrisoned in the town barracks, the Knight-messenger's first stop when a muster is called.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The local watch is garrisoned in the town barracks, the Knight-messenger's first stop when a muster is called.

short_description.last_approved_text: At the centre of the Bretonnian army is a core of soldiers, drilled since birth to be warriors par excellence.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: At the centre of the Bretonnian army is a core of soldiers, drilled since birth to be warriors par excellence.

short_description.last_approved_text: As well as making weapon hafts and quintains, carpenters also work on larger projects - such as trebuchets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As well as making weapon hafts and quintains, carpenters also work on larger projects - such as trebuchets.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large trebuchets are made at dedicated facilities, where master carpenters work to bring these devastating machines to war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large trebuchets are made at dedicated facilities, where master carpenters work to bring these devastating machines to war.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

short_description.last_approved_text: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

short_description.last_approved_text: "You see, it spins, and that's because the wind… actually, forget it. I can tell you don't understand."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "You see, it spins, and that's because the wind… actually, forget it. I can tell you don't understand."

short_description.last_approved_text: The relentless strength of water, rushing downstream, can power the industry of an entire realm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The relentless strength of water, rushing downstream, can power the industry of an entire realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: The King's most trusted Knights are given the responsibility of defending the walls and thus the realm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The King's most trusted Knights are given the responsibility of defending the walls and thus the realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Feeling a little under the weather? Oh, that's a big one! You had best come in…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "Feeling a little under the weather? Oh, that's a big one! You had best come in…"

short_description.last_approved_text: "The Lady may not provide salvation, but there is comfort in her gracious succour, which is something…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "The Lady may not provide salvation, but there is comfort in her gracious succour, which is something…"

short_description.last_approved_text: A rainbow array of vials and powders line the walls of these most aberrant and fascinating establishments.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A rainbow array of vials and powders line the walls of these most aberrant and fascinating establishments.

short_description.last_approved_text: Weaving in Bretonnia is a labour-intensive process; without the machinery and industrial production lines used by the nearby Empire, it falls upon the peasants to operate the massive looms by hand. It’s back-breaking work, so foremen and overseers are required to ensure that the peasants do not slacken off or pause to rest, and that they are dragged out of the way when they collapse from sheer exhaustion. It is their lot – the miserable, undeserving rabble should expect nothing less.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Weaving in Bretonnia is a labour-intensive process; without the machinery and industrial production lines used by the nearby Empire, it falls upon the peasants to operate the massive looms by hand. It’s back-breaking work, so foremen and overseers are required to ensure that the peasants do not slacken off or pause to rest, and that they are dragged out of the way when they collapse from sheer exhaustion. It is their lot – the miserable, undeserving rabble should expect nothing less.

short_description.last_approved_text: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

short_description.last_approved_text: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dark, dank cellars may not look like much, but to those who use them they are essential.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dark, dank cellars may not look like much, but to those who use them they are essential.

short_description.last_approved_text: "I mean it's pretty big, I guess. Not ENORMOUS, but … yeah.. quite large."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "I mean it's pretty big, I guess. Not ENORMOUS, but … yeah.. quite large."

short_description.last_approved_text: "What does the Enchantress do behind those stone walls? What's she doing in there? We have a right to know..."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "What does the Enchantress do behind those stone walls? What's she doing in there? We have a right to know..."

short_description.last_approved_text: None shall forget the names of mighty thirteen, and the twelve great battles through which they forged Bretonnia.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: None shall forget the names of mighty thirteen, and the twelve great battles through which they forged Bretonnia.

short_description.last_approved_text: What little boats may ride the waves from here are still hardier than any other in the Old World.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What little boats may ride the waves from here are still hardier than any other in the Old World.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trade and prosperity flow into Bordeleaux through this port, and with it, strength.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trade and prosperity flow into Bordeleaux through this port, and with it, strength.

short_description.last_approved_text: All ships that shove off from these docks are blessed by Manann, ready to face whatever might await them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All ships that shove off from these docks are blessed by Manann, ready to face whatever might await them.

short_description.last_approved_text: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This city lies in ruins. Nothing remains but destruction, ashes and the sorrowful taste of defeat.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: Peasant woodworkers are as much a staple of Bretonnian society as the blacksmiths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Peasant woodworkers are as much a staple of Bretonnian society as the blacksmiths.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bretonnian hamlets are pathetic - a clutch of dingy hovels inhabited by farmhands, fools and gap-toothed yokels.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bretonnian hamlets are pathetic - a clutch of dingy hovels inhabited by farmhands, fools and gap-toothed yokels.

short_description.last_approved_text: Slightly larger than Bretonnian hamlets, village buildings look much the same, though may include an inn and smithy too.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Slightly larger than Bretonnian hamlets, village buildings look much the same, though may include an inn and smithy too.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger settlements may even have a curtain wall surrounding them, with a lone, circular tower watching over its sorry denizens.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger settlements may even have a curtain wall surrounding them, with a lone, circular tower watching over its sorry denizens.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bretonnia is home to many famous cities. All are a mix of slum and grandeur, surrounded by high walls and tall towers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bretonnia is home to many famous cities. All are a mix of slum and grandeur, surrounded by high walls and tall towers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The largest Bretonnian cities surround a great castle, the residence of the local duke.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The largest Bretonnian cities surround a great castle, the residence of the local duke.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skilled blacksmiths gravitate to more prosperous towns and cities, rarely staying in villages where little business can be found.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Skilled blacksmiths gravitate to more prosperous towns and cities, rarely staying in villages where little business can be found.

short_description.last_approved_text: A trove of exquisite weaponry and armour, some said to be as old as the Grail Companions themselves.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A trove of exquisite weaponry and armour, some said to be as old as the Grail Companions themselves.

short_description.last_approved_text: More rustic stabling is given over to the peasantry for their lowly geldings and nags.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More rustic stabling is given over to the peasantry for their lowly geldings and nags.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bretonnians ride to war on proud steeds generally looked after by a squire or stable boys in well-appointed liveries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bretonnians ride to war on proud steeds generally looked after by a squire or stable boys in well-appointed liveries.

short_description.last_approved_text: What defines a Royal Stable? When the equines eat better than their riders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What defines a Royal Stable? When the equines eat better than their riders.

short_description.last_approved_text: The highly-prized pegasi of the Grey Mountains are kept in opulent 'sky-stables' known as aeries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The highly-prized pegasi of the Grey Mountains are kept in opulent 'sky-stables' known as aeries.

short_description.last_approved_text: A prison more than a stable, for those housed within are terribly untamed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A prison more than a stable, for those housed within are terribly untamed.

short_description.last_approved_text: What mysteries lie behind the curtain, what beauty behind the final breath of cloth?

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What mysteries lie behind the curtain, what beauty behind the final breath of cloth?

short_description.last_approved_text: Shrines to the Lady are usually small groves near a pure water source, adorned with fetishes and tokens of the Lady.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Shrines to the Lady are usually small groves near a pure water source, adorned with fetishes and tokens of the Lady.

short_description.last_approved_text: Grail chapels dot the landscape, sacred places often protected by a Grail Knight.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Grail chapels dot the landscape, sacred places often protected by a Grail Knight.

short_description.last_approved_text: The largest shrines can be found in major cities, yet the pious say the Lady is absent from such self-acclaimed edifices.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The largest shrines can be found in major cities, yet the pious say the Lady is absent from such self-acclaimed edifices.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: You never know when a grudge will need to be settled.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: You never know when a grudge will need to be settled.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs called to war gather in their Clan barracks, ready for a Thane’s order to move out.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs called to war gather in their Clan barracks, ready for a Thane’s order to move out.

short_description.last_approved_text: When the Dwarf throngs prepare to march it is to the mustering halls they come, ready for the call to war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the Dwarf throngs prepare to march it is to the mustering halls they come, ready for the call to war.

short_description.last_approved_text: When the King calls a war council he requests his most capable warriors go to the Hall of Oaths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When the King calls a war council he requests his most capable warriors go to the Hall of Oaths.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfen engineers are forever tinkering and refining their machines, doing so within their private workshops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfen engineers are forever tinkering and refining their machines, doing so within their private workshops.

short_description.last_approved_text: One of the most powerful and secretive of all Dwarf institutions, the Engineers' Guild can influence Kings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One of the most powerful and secretive of all Dwarf institutions, the Engineers' Guild can influence Kings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfen barley is a particularly hardy variety that can be grown on mountainsides and used to make beers and breads.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfen barley is a particularly hardy variety that can be grown on mountainsides and used to make beers and breads.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once harvested, barley grains are stored in funnel-shaped granaries within the Dwarfholds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once harvested, barley grains are stored in funnel-shaped granaries within the Dwarfholds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Stone bread is a hardy bread baked for a hardy people.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Stone bread is a hardy bread baked for a hardy people.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Bakers' Guild hall is dominated by a massive oven that channels heat from the forges in the lower deeps.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Bakers' Guild hall is dominated by a massive oven that channels heat from the forges in the lower deeps.

short_description.last_approved_text: A small chamber, most probably in the deeps or close to the Hold’s vault, in which warriors on guard duty reside.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A small chamber, most probably in the deeps or close to the Hold’s vault, in which warriors on guard duty reside.

short_description.last_approved_text: The guard halls contain Dwarf Warriors, whose duty it is to defend the Hold from enemies both within and without.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The guard halls contain Dwarf Warriors, whose duty it is to defend the Hold from enemies both within and without.

short_description.last_approved_text: The royal garrison are warriors from the King’s own bloodline and Clan, and therefore the most loyal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The royal garrison are warriors from the King’s own bloodline and Clan, and therefore the most loyal.

short_description.last_approved_text: A tinker is adept at fixing things, especially metal items, which explains why the Dwarfholds contain so many.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A tinker is adept at fixing things, especially metal items, which explains why the Dwarfholds contain so many.

short_description.last_approved_text: Despite their stubby fingers, Dwarfs create excellent, intricate and delicate clockwork for tools and other apparatus.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Despite their stubby fingers, Dwarfs create excellent, intricate and delicate clockwork for tools and other apparatus.

short_description.last_approved_text: Toolmaking, as one of the most powerful industries, is represented by a Guild.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Toolmaking, as one of the most powerful industries, is represented by a Guild.

short_description.last_approved_text: The toolmakers' foundry is located away from the main forges, as their Guild is wealthy enough to install its own.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The toolmakers' foundry is located away from the main forges, as their Guild is wealthy enough to install its own.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: The infamous and renowned Dwarf beers are left to mature until needed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The infamous and renowned Dwarf beers are left to mature until needed.

short_description.last_approved_text: More important than the gates that secure it, than the barracks that houses the soldiers, is a Dwarfhold’s brewery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More important than the gates that secure it, than the barracks that houses the soldiers, is a Dwarfhold’s brewery.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarfhold with a famed brewery attached is one worth defending at all costs, its casks as valuable as gold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A Dwarfhold with a famed brewery attached is one worth defending at all costs, its casks as valuable as gold.

short_description.last_approved_text: In locked chambers beyond the Hold's brewery, are the brewmaster's kettles. These are where the special and secret ales are brewed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In locked chambers beyond the Hold's brewery, are the brewmaster's kettles. These are where the special and secret ales are brewed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites, made when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf dye-makers are rare but not unknown, usually having a fortified plant further away from the main Hold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf dye-makers are rare but not unknown, usually having a fortified plant further away from the main Hold.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dyers' Guild is relatively small, but accrues wealth as it seeks new customers from the empires of men.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dyers' Guild is relatively small, but accrues wealth as it seeks new customers from the empires of men.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lodges, where hunters gather and store their prey, are located deep within the forested hunting grounds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lodges, where hunters gather and store their prey, are located deep within the forested hunting grounds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Camps are where Dwarf hunters assemble before their work begins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Camps are where Dwarf hunters assemble before their work begins.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not just the meat that is used, animal skins and furs certainly have value also.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not just the meat that is used, animal skins and furs certainly have value also.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Leatherworkers' Guild is mainly found in the Holds around the Vaults and Grey Mountains, where plenty of manling customers can be found.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Leatherworkers' Guild is mainly found in the Holds around the Vaults and Grey Mountains, where plenty of manling customers can be found.

short_description.last_approved_text: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones, something Dwarfs are very good at.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A gem mineshaft is for digging into the mountains in search of precious stones, something Dwarfs are very good at.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gem mines are valuable resources, especially if they have a high yield.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gem mines are valuable resources, especially if they have a high yield.

short_description.last_approved_text: Members of the Gemcutters' Guild are respected both for their craft and for the riches they create.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Members of the Gemcutters' Guild are respected both for their craft and for the riches they create.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Gemcutters' Guild is rich, by the very nature of the commodity in which it deals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Gemcutters' Guild is rich, by the very nature of the commodity in which it deals.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold has ever been lusted after by men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold has ever been lusted after by men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

short_description.last_approved_text: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once extracted from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or even minted into coins.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once extracted from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or even minted into coins.

short_description.last_approved_text: While the Goldsmiths' Guild cannot match other Guilds' influence, they are certainly the wealthiest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: While the Goldsmiths' Guild cannot match other Guilds' influence, they are certainly the wealthiest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that constantly demands new weapons and armour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that constantly demands new weapons and armour.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both man and Dwarf.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both man and Dwarf.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron smelters processes the raw iron ore so it can then be turned into steel.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron smelters processes the raw iron ore so it can then be turned into steel.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Miners' Guild has close ties to similar professions. Together they are the most powerful Guilders-bloc in the Karaz Ankor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Miners' Guild has close ties to similar professions. Together they are the most powerful Guilders-bloc in the Karaz Ankor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs know the secret of creating, not only Gromril, but puresteel also.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs know the secret of creating, not only Gromril, but puresteel also.

short_description.last_approved_text: A stonecutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and construction.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stonecutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and construction.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large marble deposits are quarried for use in opulent residences and grand halls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large marble deposits are quarried for use in opulent residences and grand halls.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he is able to fashion grand shapes from his chosen material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he is able to fashion grand shapes from his chosen material.

short_description.last_approved_text: For thousands of years, the Masons' Guild has made the Karaks the envy of the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For thousands of years, the Masons' Guild has made the Karaks the envy of the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goats are a favoured animal for rearing. This is in no small part because Dwarfs and goats share the mountainsides.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goats are a favoured animal for rearing. This is in no small part because Dwarfs and goats share the mountainsides.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goat. It’s a tough, stringy meat, but then Dwarfs are tough too, and like their food to have the same qualities!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goat. It’s a tough, stringy meat, but then Dwarfs are tough too, and like their food to have the same qualities!

short_description.last_approved_text: Goat farms comprise several herds kept in barns or other housings, perhaps even within the Hold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Goat farms comprise several herds kept in barns or other housings, perhaps even within the Hold.

short_description.last_approved_text: For all Dwarfs who work above ground, this is the Guild they turn to.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For all Dwarfs who work above ground, this is the Guild they turn to.

short_description.last_approved_text: Solidified salt is mined from brine wells. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, perfect for the underclasses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Solidified salt is mined from brine wells. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, perfect for the underclasses.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining from pits which delve ever deeper into the ground.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger brine deposits need more intensive mining from pits which delve ever deeper into the ground.

short_description.last_approved_text: Saltworks are where brine is broken down and salt is extracted from saltwater.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Saltworks are where brine is broken down and salt is extracted from saltwater.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Saltworkers' Guild lacks influence but has very close ties to the Empire, its major export partner.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Saltworkers' Guild lacks influence but has very close ties to the Empire, its major export partner.

short_description.last_approved_text: Here, saltpeter is mixed with black powder to improve its potency.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Here, saltpeter is mixed with black powder to improve its potency.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfen carpentry exceeds that of Empire craftsmen, but wood is far scarcer in the mountains.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfen carpentry exceeds that of Empire craftsmen, but wood is far scarcer in the mountains.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wood in its natural form is hard to work with, so the timber mills turn it into lumber ready for sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lumberyards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lumberyards are wholesale markets where wood is stored in great quantities before being shipped to its final customer.

short_description.last_approved_text: Unusually, the Carpenters' Guild hall is lined with wainscoting and populated with grandiose benches of the finest timber.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Unusually, the Carpenters' Guild hall is lined with wainscoting and populated with grandiose benches of the finest timber.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarfs do occasionally live above the ground - there are outposts scattered throughout the World's Edge Mountains and beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarfs do occasionally live above the ground - there are outposts scattered throughout the World's Edge Mountains and beyond.

short_description.last_approved_text: More enterprising Dwarfs seek their own fortune and join colonies away from the greater Holds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More enterprising Dwarfs seek their own fortune and join colonies away from the greater Holds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf Keeps are the bastions of the realm, impregnable forts built upon and within the mountain peaks.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf Keeps are the bastions of the realm, impregnable forts built upon and within the mountain peaks.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf fortress-cities - the Karaks - are truly a site to behold. Each an independent kingdom, together they form the "Karaz Ankor".

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Dwarf fortress-cities - the Karaks - are truly a site to behold. Each an independent kingdom, together they form the "Karaz Ankor".

short_description.last_approved_text: The greatest Dwarfholds are the most legendary; the mightiest strongholds, led by greatest Kings of the age.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The greatest Dwarfholds are the most legendary; the mightiest strongholds, led by greatest Kings of the age.

short_description.last_approved_text: Members of the Slayer Cult worship at the nearest shrine, when not seeking death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Members of the Slayer Cult worship at the nearest shrine, when not seeking death.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger Holds have greater shrines dedicated to the Ancestor Gods; Grimnir is the warrior god and patron of Slayers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger Holds have greater shrines dedicated to the Ancestor Gods; Grimnir is the warrior god and patron of Slayers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hold armies carry countless Dwarfen weapons, from ancient heirlooms to axes fresh from the forge.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hold armies carry countless Dwarfen weapons, from ancient heirlooms to axes fresh from the forge.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gromril is the rarest of ores; no ordinary forge can get anywhere near hot enough to unlock its secrets.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gromril is the rarest of ores; no ordinary forge can get anywhere near hot enough to unlock its secrets.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only in forges blessed by Valaya, with anvils etched in protective wards, will a Runesmith ply his craft.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Only in forges blessed by Valaya, with anvils etched in protective wards, will a Runesmith ply his craft.

short_description.last_approved_text: Refectories are usually found in the lower deeps, to ensure no warrior is far from ale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Refectories are usually found in the lower deeps, to ensure no warrior is far from ale.

short_description.last_approved_text: The favourite Dwarf pastime is drinking. "Gorog" is Khazalid for binge-drinking, which happens all the time!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The favourite Dwarf pastime is drinking. "Gorog" is Khazalid for binge-drinking, which happens all the time!

short_description.last_approved_text: When food is on the table as well as ale, Dwarfs retire to the feast hall to fill both their bellies and their bladders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When food is on the table as well as ale, Dwarfs retire to the feast hall to fill both their bellies and their bladders.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trade depots are effectively inland, underground ports, where merchant caravans from all over the Karaz Ankor offload their wares.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trade depots are effectively inland, underground ports, where merchant caravans from all over the Karaz Ankor offload their wares.

short_description.last_approved_text: Usually close to the trade depot, the Guild marketplace is a bazaar of grumpy, haggling, Guild factors selling their wares and services.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Usually close to the trade depot, the Guild marketplace is a bazaar of grumpy, haggling, Guild factors selling their wares and services.

short_description.last_approved_text: Dwarf gates are strong and sound, made from Dwarfen iron and put in place by Dwarfen hands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Dwarf gates are strong and sound, made from Dwarfen iron and put in place by Dwarfen hands.

short_description.last_approved_text: The gates of the greatest Kazads are banded in foot-thick steel, and guarded by the bearded sentinels of the ancestors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The gates of the greatest Kazads are banded in foot-thick steel, and guarded by the bearded sentinels of the ancestors.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strongest fortress gates are protected by more than just steel and stone.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strongest fortress gates are protected by more than just steel and stone.

short_description.last_approved_text: As well as fashioning stone, the Dwarfs are also expert carpenters, as the workers in the siege workshops will attest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As well as fashioning stone, the Dwarfs are also expert carpenters, as the workers in the siege workshops will attest.

short_description.last_approved_text: The secret of black powder, formulated here, is one shared only between the Empire and Dwarfs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The secret of black powder, formulated here, is one shared only between the Empire and Dwarfs.

short_description.last_approved_text: The lower deeps of the Dwarfholds glow from the many war machines created in their foundries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The lower deeps of the Dwarfholds glow from the many war machines created in their foundries.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hangars, high among the mountain tops, from which Dwarfen air fleets launch.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hangars, high among the mountain tops, from which Dwarfen air fleets launch.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is on the training field that soldiers first learn the most important of attributes, that of discipline.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is on the training field that soldiers first learn the most important of attributes, that of discipline.

short_description.last_approved_text: On hearing the call to muster, it is to the rally field the regiments will gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On hearing the call to muster, it is to the rally field the regiments will gather.

short_description.last_approved_text: Barracks are, by necessity, large billet houses for accommodating State Troops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Barracks are, by necessity, large billet houses for accommodating State Troops.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World has many mouths to feed; grain provides the grist for mills and the base ingredient for spirits.

short_description.last_approved_text: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Farms large and small cross the Old World – growing crops, especially grains, for the crowded towns and cities.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wherever the forest breaks, large swathes of land are given over to agriculture, most of which is owned by nobles.

short_description.last_approved_text: One who is well-versed in the secrets of shaping ores into gun and artillery barrels. It is a skill set in much demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One who is well-versed in the secrets of shaping ores into gun and artillery barrels. It is a skill set in much demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Empire’s war needs cannot be matched by a single forge, so large foundries are built to keep up with demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Empire’s war needs cannot be matched by a single forge, so large foundries are built to keep up with demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: Master Engineers are eccentrics, their workshops home to crazy inventions and devastating weapons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Master Engineers are eccentrics, their workshops home to crazy inventions and devastating weapons.

short_description.last_approved_text: Often attached to the walls they protect, the guard house offers shelter and perhaps a hot drink for those on patrol.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Often attached to the walls they protect, the guard house offers shelter and perhaps a hot drink for those on patrol.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Watch is an organised constabulary; not always honest, but still a capable defensive force should the need arise!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Watch is an organised constabulary; not always honest, but still a capable defensive force should the need arise!

short_description.last_approved_text: Garrisons are occupied by state troops; dedicated soldiers placed to defend the settlement by the Elector Count.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Garrisons are occupied by state troops; dedicated soldiers placed to defend the settlement by the Elector Count.

short_description.last_approved_text: The deft creation of cloth is one of man's specialities. Their flamboyant clothing couldn’t exist without weavers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The deft creation of cloth is one of man's specialities. Their flamboyant clothing couldn’t exist without weavers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The clothier turns the bolts of cloth from mere linen to garments – anything from shirts to large, frilly pantaloons!

short_description.last_approved_text: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For some, fashion is as important as a sharp blade to have upon your person. Tailors offer such bespoke stylings.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wharfs are platforms jutting out of the water, allowing ships to be boarded easily.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whether man-made or natural, a harbour is a place for vessels to wait out Stromfel's rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Large port-cities are strategically key during wartime, for they are home to its great fleets, both military or mercantile.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cinnabar, also known as blood rock, is a mineral which contains mercury, prized by alchemists and dye-makers alike.

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites for when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Blood rock mines are larger excavation sites for when substantial cinnabar deposits are discovered.

short_description.last_approved_text: Usually situated in the same noxious district as the tanners, a dye-maker’s plant also spills out fumes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Usually situated in the same noxious district as the tanners, a dye-maker’s plant also spills out fumes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Empire Huntsmen are known for their skill with a bow. Camps are where they launch their forays into the forest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Empire Huntsmen are known for their skill with a bow. Camps are where they launch their forays into the forest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lodges are located deep within the forested hunting grounds, where hunters gather and store their prey.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lodges are located deep within the forested hunting grounds, where hunters gather and store their prey.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not just meat that has its uses, skins and furs do too - at the tannery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not just meat that has its uses, skins and furs do too - at the tannery.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold has ever been lusted after by both men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold has ever been lusted after by both men and Dwarfs. Small mines dot the Old World, their owners hoping to strike big.

short_description.last_approved_text: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine gets larger and needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: On discovering a substantial seam of gold, a small mine gets larger and needs fortifying against other treasure-seekers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once recovered from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or minted into coins of the realm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Once recovered from the mountains, gold is smelted into bars or minted into coins of the realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that craves weapons and armour. Smaller mines usually comprise a single shaft.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron ore is a necessity in a world that craves weapons and armour. Smaller mines usually comprise a single shaft.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both men and Dwarfs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron mines are the most common underground works of both men and Dwarfs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Iron smelters process the raw iron ore, so it can be turned into steel or fashioned by smiths.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Iron smelters process the raw iron ore, so it can be turned into steel or fashioned by smiths.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Old World has very few master swordsmiths, for they are the finest craftsmen in the realm and always in demand.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Old World has very few master swordsmiths, for they are the finest craftsmen in the realm and always in demand.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marble is used in opulent residences and grand halls. Where large deposits are discovered, a quarry is constructed to get at it!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marble is used in opulent residences and grand halls. Where large deposits are discovered, a quarry is constructed to get at it!

short_description.last_approved_text: A stone cutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stone cutter fashions large hunks of stone, for ease of transport and in preparation for construction.

short_description.last_approved_text: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he adds craft to the role and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A mason is more than a mere stone cutter, he adds craft to the role and is able to form grand shapes from his chosen material.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are farms that are little more than tiny, muddy fields, on which graze scrawny goats or cattle with shrivelled udders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are farms that are little more than tiny, muddy fields, on which graze scrawny goats or cattle with shrivelled udders.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger cattle farms have more land and better, more permanent, housing for the animals they keep.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Larger cattle farms have more land and better, more permanent, housing for the animals they keep.
{{tr:wh_main_emp_resource_pastures_3}}

short_description.last_approved_text: Warhorse breeders excel at sourcing the bravest and finest destriers for stud.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warhorse breeders excel at sourcing the bravest and finest destriers for stud.

short_description.last_approved_text: Unsurprisingly, clay pits hold vast amounts of clay, a malleable material that hardens when baked.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Unsurprisingly, clay pits hold vast amounts of clay, a malleable material that hardens when baked.

short_description.last_approved_text: A potter is a craftsman who fashions clay into pottery and other ceramics, from fine crockery to the most basic of bowls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A potter is a craftsman who fashions clay into pottery and other ceramics, from fine crockery to the most basic of bowls.

short_description.last_approved_text: Kilns are large ovens mostly used by local potters, who bring their merchandise to be baked prior to sale.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Kilns are large ovens mostly used by local potters, who bring their merchandise to be baked prior to sale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Brine wells are where solidified salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Brine wells are where solidified salt is mined. It’s an unpleasant and hazardous job, but perfect for the underclasses.
